title: High Resolution Celebrations
body:
In High Resolution Conversations, I discuss how we might improve our conversations with the goals of accuracy and charity, but I also like to add ray-traced images in my posts from time to time.

It’s common for people to celebrate significant milestones on Substack, e.g., 200 subscribers or 100 posts. I like to celebrate others’ wins by sharing my images with them. I already had an image for “100”, but I have added images for “200” through “1000” as well.

Have you hit a significant milestone on Substack? Let’s celebrate together!
